title: A Dose of reality
creator_credit: Suzanne St Pierre and CBS News
brief_description: A study of death and dying with emphasis on giving the terminally ill patient a choice in making decisions until the end. A nurse at a Pennsylvania hospital has developed a unique program for the dying patient. Looks at the prospect of death and what can be done to make it easier for the patient and family.
